task.name: Cropping a Picture and Inserting a Textbox

texts_formatted.txt: On Slide 7, crop the picture until the right edge of the picture aligns with 2 inches to the right of zero on the horizontal ruler.
Drag the right edge of the caption placeholder until it aligns with the right edge of the picture.
Anywhere to the right of the picture, insert a new text box with the text Meet our newest musician (no period). Press ENTER and type James Todd (no period). Change the font size to 24.
Center the text in the text box.
Position the text box horizontally at 9 and vertically at 3. Close the Format Shape pane.
